mapper.select: SELECT i.intro_id, c.company_name, i.intro_title, i.intro_task, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_location, i.intro_image, i.intro_birth, j.job_name, j.job_code, i.company_id FROM intro i LEFT OUTER JOIN company c ON i.company_id = c.company_id LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON i.job_id = j.job_id WHERE intro_id = #{introId}
mapper.update: UPDATE intro i RIGHT JOIN company c ON (c.company_id = i.company_id) RIGHT JOIN job j ON (j.job_id = i.job_id) SET c.company_name = #{companyName}, i.intro_birth = #{introBirth}, i.intro_task = #{introTask}, i.intro_wellfare = #{introWellfare}, i.intro_sal = #{introSal}, i.intro_content = #{introContent}, i.intro_location = #{introLocation}, i.intro_image = #{introImage}, j.job_name = #{jobName} WHERE i.intro_id = #{introId}
